Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to establishing a real property tax exemption for reservists
Summary: Establishes a real property tax exemption for reservists.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to establishing an exemption for reservists
